overview: Lisa is responsible for product vision, strategy, design, and execution. Prior to joining FanSnap, Lisa ran a very active product management consulting practice with several clients including StubHub. Lisa was with Yahoo! for seven years leading product management teams responsible for Yahoo’s core communication services, including Yahoo! Mail and Yahoo! Messenger. Lisa also managed strategic product initiatives at Walt Disney Imagineering, and before that was Director of Network Development at Channel One Communications. Lisa began her career as an investment banker for Goldman, Sachs & Co. in New York and Hong Kong. Lisa holds an A.B. in East Asian Studies from Princeton University, and an MBA from the Graduate School of Business at Stanford University.
